item.title: DIY 5$: deploy Wordpress + free SSL with letsencrypt and haproxy
item.description: If you are starting your new business or want to have your own blog, hosting your website is something are looking for. But you are asking yourself: “What is a cheap and good way to host my website?”. Well, I have asked myself the same question and I got the answer. I had already a server on Linode, so I have decided to use it and deploy my website on it.
